snippet: The family of a photographer for an Islamist newspaper who was killed on Monday, moments after recording an image of a sniper aiming a rifle at him, told The Lede that legal action is planned against the soldier.
abstract: The family of a photographer for an Islamist newspaper who was killed on Monday, moments after recording an image of a sniper aiming a rifle at him, told The Lede that legal action is planned against the soldier.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and BEN HUBBARD

headline.main: Egyptian Journalist Was Killed by Army Sniper He Filmed, Family Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
